column2: Calif. utility attack should prompt U.S. safety review-Democrats WASHINGTON
column3: Feb 7 Senate Democrats urged U.S. power regulators on Friday to consider whether additional safety standards were needed to protect power plants after a sniper attack disrupted operations at a California utility last year. ~
